english.segment1: I don't want to say goodbye. I can see the fear inside your eyes. It's so hard to walk away
english.segment2: I know that this feels like the end. Life never seems to let you win. But I'll be back someday
english.segment3: I'm already missing you. But I'm not even gone. In time we'll be together again. And it won't be long
english.segment4: Now everything goes up and down. And the world keeps spinning round and round. And still you're waiting there
english.segment5: I'll try to make it another night. And dream of you when I close my eyes. Cause I'll be back someday. Just hold it in. Don't let it go. You'll always live. Inside my soul
